text: <@U3T21PDBK> you ever figure this out? Im having the same issue
nope… I just don’t use the inherited fields feature in modules because it doesn’t work at production quality :cry:
^ Looks like inherited fields don't work. Basically, inherit fields in modules only update in the UI. The actual value doesn't change. Anyone else run into this issue?

Is it a pain to override the border radius inline or otherwise? This module only allows you to adjust all corners (what you would want 95% of the time) but for this module, I want to only round the top left and right corners to 8px, but leave the bottom two at 0px. Any help is appreciated. Thanks!
You'd have to edit the module code and add fields for each corner

How to make theme fields.json file? I have created a folder and have my module in it but how could I create this file in a folder and theme.primary_color would get color from a theme but my module is in a simple folder not any theme. So, could you help me with that?
